Name: Minotaur
About the game: Destroy your enemies however you want to destroy your enemies. If you want to button mash through them, that will work for the weaker ones. If you want to block and counter their attacks, you can. If you want to dodge or roll away from their attacks, you can. If you want to crush your enemy to death with a giant rock, then you just need to find a giant rock.
